name: Jasper's Quest
description:
Overview

Play as a jerkish youngster, that no one likes, but wants to try and change for the better. 

Goal

The Player decides whether or not to continue being a prick or to take up the neighborhood's request and do something nice for a change.

Gameplay

You explore the neighborhood as Jasper. You find townsfolk and can choose to do their quest, or not. If you do not fulfill their quests, your reputation goes down. A high reputation leads to the good ending, a bad one leads to the bad ending. After communicating with all npc’s the game is over, and your ending will be decided based on your final reputation.

Install instructions

Download the zip file and extract all, then run the executable
